name: Tanker_Defense.Fiery_Aura
display_help: Through intense heat and fire, you can absorb many kinds of damage. Fiery Aura offers superior resistance to Fire damage, but weak resistance to Cold damage and no protection to Knockback. Fiery Aura is the most offensive of the Tanker's defensive Power Sets, offering some damage output.

powers.name: Tanker_Defense.Fiery_Aura.Blazing_Aura
powers.display_help: While active, you are surrounded by flames that burn all foes that attempt to enter melee range. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Fast

powers.name: Tanker_Defense.Fiery_Aura.Fire_Shield
powers.display_help: While this power is active, Fire Shield gives you good resistance to Lethal, Smashing and Fire damage. Fire Shield also provides minimal resistance to Cold damage as well as protection from Disorient effects. Recharge: Very Fast
powers.display_short_help: Toggle: Self +Res(Fire, Lethal, Smash, Cold, Disorient)

display_info: 30.00% resistance to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage for 0.75s on self
10.00% resistance to cold damage for 0.75s on self
30.00% resistance to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage for 0.75s on self
10.00% resistance to cold damage for 0.75s on self
129.75% resistance to stun for 0.75s on self

powers.name: Tanker_Defense.Fiery_Aura.Healing_Flames
powers.display_help: You can concentrate for a few moments to heal yourself. The power of the flames can also protect you from Toxic Damage for a while. Recharge: Slow

display_info: 20.00% resistance to toxic damage for 1m 0s on self

powers.name: Tanker_Defense.Fiery_Aura.Temperature_protection
powers.display_help: Temperature Protection gives you strong resistance to Fire damage, some resistance to Cold damage as well as some resistance to slow effects. This power is always on and costs no Endurance.

display_info: 10.00% resistance to cold damage for 10.25s on self
30.00% resistance to fire damage for 10.25s on self
20.00% resistance to run speed debuff, fly speed debuff, jump speed debuff, jump height debuff, recharge debuff for 10.25s on self

powers.name: Tanker_Defense.Fiery_Aura.Consume
powers.display_help: You can drain body heat from all nearby foes in order to replenish your own Endurance. The more foes affected, the more Endurance is gained. Foes suffer minimal Fire damage. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Long

display_info: 5.00% recovery rate for 15s on self after 0.25s delay
50.00% resistance to endurance debuff for 2m 0s on self after 0.25s delay

powers.name: Tanker_Defense.Fiery_Aura.Plasma_Sheild
powers.display_help: While this power is active, you are surrounded by pure plasma. The Plasma Shield gives you resistance to Energy, Negative Energy, and Fire damage. Plasma Shield also gives your protection from Sleep and Hold effects. Recharge: Very Fast
powers.display_short_help: Toggle: Self +Res(Energy, Negative, Fire, Hold, Sleep)

display_info: 30.00% resistance to fire damage, energy damage, negative energy damage for 0.75s on self
-13.0 hold protection, sleep protection for 0.75s on self
30.00% resistance to fire damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage for 0.75s on self
129.75% resistance to hold, sleep for 0.75s on self
30.00% resistance to defense debuff, to hit debuff, recharge debuff for 0.75s on self
50.00% resistance to run speed debuff, fly speed debuff, jump speed debuff, jump height debuff for 0.75s on self

powers.name: Tanker_Defense.Fiery_Aura.Burn
powers.display_help: You can ignite the ground beneath you, freeing yourself from Immobilization effects. Foes that enter the flames you leave behind will take damage. You must be near the ground to activate this power. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow

display_info: 129.75% resistance to immobilize for 1m 40s on self

powers.name: Tanker_Defense.Fiery_Aura.Fiery_Embrace
powers.display_help: Significantly boosts the damage of all your Fire attacks for quite a while. Also increases the damage of all your other non-fire based attacks for a short while. Recharge: Long

display_info: 100.00% strength to fire damage for 20s on self
80.00% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 10s on self

powers.name: Tanker_Defense.Fiery_Aura.Rise_of_the_Phoenix
powers.display_help: If you are defeated, you can rise from the ashes. The fiery resurrection blasts nearby foes with an explosion and knocks them down and Disorients them. You will revive with about half of your Hit Points and Endurance. Rise of the Phoenix will actually leave you invulnerable for a brief time, and protected from XP Debt for 90 seconds. Recharge: Very Long

display_info: 1 ticks of 937.03 heal for 0.5s on self
